products.name: Soloist
products.title: 1 person backpacking tent
products.description: 1-person 3-season backpacking tent weighing 1.2kg (XL is 1.3kg). Free-standing and stable with ample head height and a compact pack-size. Now available in a longer length option.

products.name: Ordos 2
products.title: Ultralight backpacking tent
products.description: Ultralight 2 person semi-geodesic backpacking tent weighing 1.4 kg, designed to maximise comfort for its weight and small pack size

products.name: Viso 3
products.title: Backpacking tunnel tent
products.description: Large living areas and strong weather protection whilst being light enough to carry on extended self-supported trips. 3 season backpacking tunnel tent weighing 3.9kg

products.name: Roundhouse
products.title: Backpacking tunnel tent
products.description: The Roundhouse is a luxury two-person bell tent, using sustainable, long-lasting materials. Highly breathable polycotton canvas maintains a comfortable climate of fresh air day and night, staying cool in the heat and warm in the cold.

products.name: Roundhouse
products.title: 4 season geodesic mountain tent
products.description: Exceptional protection with a central spreader bar to increase the living area with uncompromising strength and stability. 4 person 4 season mountain tent.

products.name: Pasvik
products.title: 4-6 Outer Tent incl. Pole
products.description: Pasvik is suitable for those who want to go longer distances with as little weight in the backpack as possible, but also want the comfort and features of a lavvu. The lavvu has a large and wide entrance with a full mosquito net which, together with adjustable vents and the top hat, ensures a good indoor climate.

products.name: Cloud Peak 140
products.title: Synthetic 1 season sleeping bag
products.description: The Cloud Peak 140 is a summer weight 1 season sleeping bag using Thermolite insulation. Hard-wearing and excelling in damp conditions, it’s an ideal sleeping bag for summer bivvies, festival camping and warm weather bikepacking.

products.name: Cloud Peak 300
products.title: 3 season synthetic sleeping bag
products.description: The Cloud Peak 300 is a 3 season synthetic sleeping bag designed for spring to autumn camping in typical UK conditions. Excelling in damp conditions, it makes an ideal sleeping bag for bivvying or soggy backpacks when you can’t guarantee to keep your kit dry all weekend.

products.name: SkyeHigh 500
products.title: Lightweight 3 season duck down sleeping bag
products.description: Classic and versatile, SkyeHigh was designed to loft its way effortlessly into almost any situation, using 650+ IDFB fill power duck down to balance weight and bulk-size with comfort, warmth, and value.

products.name: SkyeHigh 900
products.title: Lightweight 4 season duck down sleeping bag
products.description: Classic and versatile, SkyeHigh was designed to loft its way effortlessly into almost any situation, using 650+ IDFB fill power duck down to balance weight and bulk-size with comfort, warmth, and value.

products.name: AlpineDream 800
products.title: Mountaineering down sleeping bag
products.description: Ultralight sleeping bag for Alpine mountaineering: filled with 800g of 750FP goose down, -15ºC limit, weighing 1300g

products.name: ArcticDream 1200
products.title: Expedition down sleeping bag
products.description: Expedition sleeping bag for polar and high altitude use, filled with 1200g of 750FP goose down, -22°C limit, weighing 1700g. The ArcticDream 1200 is a seriously warm sleeping bag for serious adventures. It's been designed for expeditions to extreme cold environments like the high Himalaya and Polar regions.

products.name: ArcticDream 1400
products.title: Expedition down sleeping bag
products.description: Expedition sleeping bag for polar and high altitude use, filled with 1400g of 750FP goose down, -27°C limit, weighing 1900g. The ArcticDream 1400 is a seriously warm sleeping bag for serious adventures. It's been designed for expeditions to extreme cold environments like the high Himalaya and Polar regions.

products.name: 3 Season Sleep Bundle
products.title: Bundle package
products.description: Get out in 3 seasons a year with a super warm duck down sleeping bag and DirtBag sleep mat.

products.name: Artlu 10
products.title: Running backpack
products.description: 10-litre running backpack with a secure and comfortable fit. For long trail, fell and ultra runs or fast and light days in the hills

products.name: Artlu 10
products.title: Running backpack
products.description: 10-litre running backpack with a secure and comfortable fit. For long trail, fell and ultra runs or fast and light days in the hills

products.name: Ledge 35
products.title: 35 litre hiking daypack
products.description: Lightweight 35 litre mountain daypack. Slim, streamlined design, with pole and ice axe loops for four season hiking and scrambling

products.name: Ledge 35
products.title: 35 litre hiking daypack
products.description: Lightweight 35 litre mountain daypack. Slim, streamlined design, with pole and ice axe loops for four season hiking and scrambling

products.name: Pacific Crest 65
products.title: 65 litre rucksack
products.description: 65 litre rucksack for self-sufficient backpacking in comfort over multiple days: light, tough and comfortable

products.name: Gourdon 20
products.title: 20 litre waterproof backpack
products.description: Waterproof 20 litre backpack with roll-top closure, bungee straps and mesh pockets for added capacity, ideal for anything from adventure races to the daily commute.

products.name: Gourdon 20
products.title: 20 litre waterproof backpack
products.description: Waterproof 20 litre backpack with roll-top closure, bungee straps and mesh pockets for added capacity, ideal for anything from adventure races to the daily commute.

products.name: Alleycat
products.title: Messenger bag
products.description: Waxed cotton messenger bag for commuting, travel, or just looking mighty swish as you go about your business

products.name: Alleycat
products.title: Messenger bag
products.description: Waxed cotton messenger bag for commuting, travel, or just looking mighty swish as you go about your business

products.name: Tyrol
products.title: 20 litre waxed cotton rucksack
products.description: 20 litre waxed cotton rucksack with a roll-top entry and padded back panel; for hilly day walks or just carrying your kit to the climbing wall

products.name: Cloud Base
products.title: Inflatable sleeping mat
products.description: Lightweight inflatable camping mat weighing 420g and 5 cm thick to soak up uneven ground

products.name: Airo 180
products.title: Lightweight self-inflating camping mat
products.description: The Airo 180 is perfect for any trip where minimal weight and small pack size are paramount - but you still need the insulation of a foam mat.

products.name: Numo
products.title: Inflatable lightweight sleeping mat
products.description: Big chamber full length lightweight sleeping mat weighing just 350 g, packs down smaller than a self-inflating mat saving space in your sack

products.name: Napster
products.title: Closed cell foam camping mat
products.description: 8 mm closed cell foam mat for camping; a simple roll mat to use alone or as an insulation layer under a regular mat on frozen ground

products.name: Dumo
products.title: Comfortable inflatable camping mat
products.description: Full-length inflatable camping mat with a built-in foam pump and an off-the-scale lightness to comfort ratio.

products.name: Viper
products.title: Head torch
products.description: 240 lumen rainproof head torch with reactive lighting mode that strikes the balance between brightness and burn time. Compact, light, and handy for all-manner of adventures

products.name: Qark
products.title: Rechargeable head torch
products.description: 580 lumen rechargeable head torch. Compatible with AAA batteries for when you’re recharging your battery pack, it’s perfect for running, hiking, climbing and multi-day adventures

products.name: Prism
products.title: Waterproof head torch
products.description: USB rechargeable waterproof and drop proof head torch with 400 lumen boost mode that can cope with whatever you throw at it, ideal for adverse conditions and remote places

products.name: Manta
products.title: Rechargeable head torch
products.description: USB rechargeable 300 lumen head torch with 11 hour burn time on max power and rear safety light, ideal for mountain marathons, endurance races, and all night adventuring

products.name: Flare
products.title: Folding usb solar panel
products.description: Thin, light and waterproof USB solar panel for charging devices in remote areas. Folds away neatly into rucksacks and bike luggage

products.name: MytiMug 650
products.title: Titanium cooking mug
products.description: A perfectly sized titanium cooking mug for the soloist adventurer, can be used on a stove to cook your meal or just supping tea around your camp fire

products.name: MytiMug 400
products.title: 400 ml titanium mug
products.description: 400 ml titanium mug, perfectly proportioned for morning coffee and soup at lunch, the perfect cooking mug for lightweight heroes

products.name: AliPots
products.title: 4 piece cooking pan set
products.description: A simple aluminium pan set which deserves a place on any extended camping trip. Durable with a generous pan capacity from which you can serve up a feast

products.name: MytiStax
products.title: Titanium 3 piece pan set
products.description: Lightweight titanium 3 piece pan set including 2 pots and a frying pan, a versatile and portable cooking set

products.name: TiMigos
products.title: Titanium cutlery set
products.description: Titanium knife, fork and spoon set to take on every camping adventure

products.name: Tifoon
products.title: Titanium spork
products.description: Titanium spork (or foon? or forked spoon) with bottle opener giving 3 functions in one, the ultimate lightweight camping cutlery

products.name: Tipsy
products.title: Stainless steel hip flask
products.description: Polished stainless steel hip flask to carry 170 ml of your favourite tipple

products.name: Daytripper
products.title: Stainless steel insulated flask
products.description: Tough 700 ml stainless steel insulated flask to keep your beverages hot and shaped to easily fit in your rucksack

products.name: Onsen
products.title: Collapsible camping sink
products.description: Pocket-sized pop-up camping sink made from high-strength Cordura® nylon. 10L capacity for washing your dishes on backpacks, bike tours and car camps

products.name: Bota
products.title: 2l hydration bladder
products.description: 2 litre hydration bladder with a lockable bite valve and fold top, ideal for when you’re out all day with limited refill stops

products.name: Sawyer
products.title: Water filtration bottle
products.description: Personal water filtration bottle for convenience and simplicity when you're on the go

products.name: Real Turmat
products.title: Thai red curry stew
products.description: Asian vegan stew with chickpeas and rice. Choose this if you like spicy food, regardless of whether you are vegan or not.

products.name: Real Turmat
products.title: Salmon pasta with cream
products.description: Northern Norway salmon with dill, peas and carrot. This is the whole family's fish dish and since the meal is based on pasta, it already has a foothold among the younger ones.

products.name: Real Turmat
products.title: Pulled pork with rice
products.description: Inspired by American cuisine. Rice-based stew with long-cooked pork, which is then shredded. Completely unique dish. Gluten- and Lactose-free.

products.name: Real Turmat
products.title: Chocolate musli
products.description: Ideal for breakfast or a quick lunch

products.name: Real Turmat
products.title: Pasta Bolognese
products.description: A classic meal for everyone

products.name: Real Energy
products.title: Chocolate bar energy
products.description: Chocolate with 60% cocoa content. Lactose free. 50g.

products.name: Real Energy
products.title: Chocolate bar energy
products.description: Chocolate with 60% cocoa content. Lactose free. 50g.

products.name: Real Energy
products.title: Chocolate bar energy
products.description: Chocolate with 60% cocoa content. Lactose free. 50g.

products.name: Sonder Twin
products.title: Titanium road tandem
products.description: Titanium road tandem that gives a beautifully smooth ride for pairs on days out pedalling across continents on extended tours – balanced for speed, comfort and carrying capacity

products.name: VIR FORTIS GX
products.title: Full carbon fat bike
products.description: When you want to go places a regular skinny bike won’t, go you need a hero. Enter Vir Fortis, a bike made for terrain that may never have been navigated on two wheels, crushing turnips, or for just in case you get snowed in and need to save the neighbourhood.

products.name: COLIBRI AL RIVAL
products.title: Aluminium disc brake endurance road bike
products.description: Feel fresher for longer. Colibri's modern performance geometry is tuned in for all-day riding comfort and speed on Britain’s varied road surfaces. Colibri Al is for Alpine adventures, exploring new roads, riding in the summer and for riding through the winter, where you’ll get out, no matter what the weather’s doing. It’s the bike for every day of the year.

products.name: BROKEN ROAD GX
products.title: Titanium hardtail mountain bike
products.description: Multi-day expedition, titanium mountain bike with SRAMs new GX Eagle drivetrain, RockShox Recon forks and Sonder Alpha 650b+ boost wheels; designed for big mountains and fully-loaded for adventures.

products.name: CAMINO AL RIVAL
products.title: Drop bar gravel bike
products.description: Aluminium Camino frame and carbon blade fork for multi-day expeditions, built with SRAM Rival1 groupset and class-leading components for round-the-world travel.

products.name: EVOL GX
products.title: Fast and agile aggressive 29er
products.description: Fast, agile 140/150mm full suspension 29er. In its element on extreme ground with a bottomless feel and poppy ride, climbs well and descends flat out

products.name: SIGNAL ST GX
products.title: Steel aggressive hardtail 29er mountain bike
products.description: A fast and aggressive steel 29er hardtail trail bike with GX Eagle 12 speed groupset and Rockshox Pike Ultimate fork: the bike that inspires confidence on fast flowy trails and big mountains

products.name: TRANSMITTER GX
products.title: Aggressive hard tail mountain bike
products.description: A fast and aggressive steel 29er hardtail trail bike with GX Eagle 12 speed groupset and Rockshox Pike Ultimate fork: the bike that inspires confidence on fast flowy trails and big mountains
